title: Exciting Announcement!
body: We are thrilled to share our latest update with you. Stay tuned for more details!

title: New Features Coming Soon
body: Our team is working hard on some fantastic new features. Get ready for an enhanced experience!

title: User Feedback Needed
body: We value your feedback! Please share your thoughts on our latest update in the comments.

title: Maintenance Scheduled
body: We will be performing scheduled maintenance on our platform tomorrow from 2 AM to 4 AM. Thank you for your patience.
